message.heading: INVEST WITH CONFIDENCE
message.paragrph: Our proprietary AI sourcing model, analyzes hundreds of factors, and evaluates thousands of properties, to provide you with selected highly qualified investment properties.

logIn.welcomeMessage: Welcome back! Please enter your details

propertyDetails.riskNote: Capital At Risk - Please read Key Risks and Purchaser's Rights before investing. Note: Investment metrics displayed on this page are based on Selling Price/Share of $10 and property closing date of Aug 2021

home.midSectionHeading: Real Estate investing made for you
home.messageBold: BuyProperly lets you invest in real estate to grow and diversify your wealth without traditional upfront costs.
home.message: Starting at $2500, our AI-powered platform helps you achieve above-human performance earning monthly rental income, as well as capital appreciation.
